title: To make single family housing owned by the Department of Housing and Urban Development available for purchase by teachers and public safety officers at a discount.
content: Community Partners Next Door Act of 2005 - Amends the National Housing Act to provide: (1) a 50 discount for teachers, teacher assistants, administrators, and public safety officers purchasing (FY2006-FY2010) certain eligible asset properties for use as their primary residence. And (2) a $100 downpayment on any related insured mortgage. Authorizes such sales directly to a qualifying individual or to a unit of local government or a nonprofit organization for resale to such individual.
